title: The Psychology of Happiness: Science or Trend?
description:
John and Shukri discuss the psychological study of happiness. From gratitude journals to meditation, the psychology of happiness hopes to provide answers to difficult questions, but the question remains:  Is it a trend, or is it legitimate science? 

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
